hooks.command: terminal-notifier -title 'juiz' -subtitle 'セレソンシステム有効' -message '持つべきものの義務を遂行してください'

current_cost=$(ccusage session --json | jq -r '.sessions[-1].totalCost') && saved_cost=$(jq -r '.totalCost' .claude/juiz_cost.json 2>/dev/null || echo 0) && cost_diff=$(echo "$current_cost - $saved_cost" | bc) && new_credit=$(jq --argjson diff $cost_diff '.credit - $diff' .claude/juiz_credit.json) && echo "{\"credit\": $new_credit}" > .claude/juiz_credit.json && terminal-notifier -title 'juiz' -subtitle '受理されました' -message "${cost_diff}ドル / 残高:${new_credit}ドル"
